titles.title: Public Private Vocational Partnership Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a business credit for donations for vocational educational purposes.
Public Private Vocational Partnership Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Public Private Vocational Partnership Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow corporations (other than S corporations, personal holding companies, and service organizations) a general business tax credit for: (1) charitable contributions to secondary schools, community colleges, or technical schools that provide vocational education; and (2) employing interns as part of a vocational education course approved by a secondary school or community college.
